sentences.sContent: Here in Trinity it is right that I should give you an account of how he lived amongst you during these years of his greatest achievement.
sentences.sContent_eng: Here in Trinity it is right that I should give you an account of how he lived amongst you during these years of his greatest achievement.
sentences.sCn: 正是在三一学院这儿，我将对你们阐述他如何在你们中间生活，如何在这些年中取得他的最伟大的成就。
